name: Meapy
body:
Project 1: [Slava's Pizzaz](https://meepiable.github.io/cheese/)

Description: This is my first project I uploaded to [GitHub websites](https://github.com/). This project is about a pizza place called *_Slava's Pizzaz_*. You get to be the customer and order infinity amount of pizzas, but you just have to pay for them! >:)

Update notice: I am going to let you have more then one pizza type. (More tabs on the screen) I am also adding more flavours.

###### More coming soon!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
